meanings.sent1: The two friends had noncongruent opinions on the movie.
meanings.sent2: The colors of the painting were noncongruent and clashed.
meanings.sent3: The noncongruent dance moves of the duo made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Their noncongruent schedules made it hard to meet up.
meanings.sent5: The noncongruent puzzle pieces didn't fit together.

meanings.definition: Not identical in shape or size
meanings.sent2: Her noncongruent shoes caused discomfort while walking.
meanings.sent3: The noncongruent cupcakes looked funny on the dessert table.
meanings.sent4: The noncongruent trees in the forest created a unique landscape.
meanings.sent5: The noncongruent keys didn't fit the lock.

meanings.sent1: The triangles were noncongruent and couldn't be superimposed.
meanings.sent2: The noncongruent angles in the shape puzzled the students.
meanings.sent3: The noncongruent outfits at the party stood out.
meanings.sent4: Their noncongruent goals led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The noncongruent lines on the graph showed different trends.
